author: mrglavas
msg: Enhancing the QName.hashCode() algorithm to make it more resistant to collisions. The hash function is randomly selected from a large family of possible functions when the class is loaded. Added a system property (javax.xml.namespace.QName.useCompatibleHashCodeAlgorithm) so that users can restore the old behaviour if they require it for some reason.

author: szetszwo
msg: HDFS-3601. Add BlockPlacementPolicyWithNodeGroup to support block placement with 4-layer network topology.  Contributed by Junping Du

author: avd
msg: PHOTARK-86:Achieving Facebook Photos display patch from Bhargav Golla

author: jwross
msg: ARIES-866: Added copyrights to classes in core and itests that needed them.
